column5: HOW TO START EACH DAY WITH A POSITIVE OUTLOOK:  1. Open a new file in your computer. 2. Name it "Michael Ignatieff". 3. Send it to the Recycle Bin. 4. Empty the Recycle Bin. 5. Your PC will ask you: 'Do you really want to get rid of "Michael Ignatieff?" 6. Firmly Click 'Yes.' 7. Feel better?  GOOD! ----- Tomorrow we'll do "Jack Layton"!
I tried it with Jean Charest......it works also
